content:
# The insertion of 5 iron ore into the furnace was successful, and the furnace is now in a "WORKING" status. However, it still shows that it has only 4 iron ore remaining, which means it will need more ore to continue smelting after this batch.
# 
# The furnace has already produced 18 iron plates, and it will produce more as it processes the current iron ore. I will monitor the production until it completes the smelting process.

# Waiting for the smelting process to complete, while checking periodically.
for _ in range(20):  # Maximum wait time of 20 seconds
    if inspect_inventory()[Prototype.IronPlate] >= 25:  # Checking if I have at least 25 iron plates.
        break
    sleep(1)
else:
    raise Exception("Smelting timeout - check fuel and inputs")  # Raise an error if smelting didn't finish.

# After that, I will check the inventory again.
